name: Read & Rhyme
overview: Read & Rhyme is a 1 - 2 player educational reading game for multiple systems. There are 2 levels of difficulty for each game. Alpha Blast: Alphabetize a list of 10 words to blast a rocket into space. Flying Saucer: Direct the flying saucer to the words in alphabetical order. Rhyming Challenge: Type as many rhyming words as possible in 10 tries. Rhyming Rockets: Select 1 of 3 rockets which have a non-rhyming word, and then send the rocket to the moon.
